title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5504.10 - U-turns
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5504.10 - U-turns

State Regulations

No U-turns shall be made on the vehicular crossing except
under the direction of an authority employee. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5504.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
